about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a mobile application developer passionate about Native development and tackling new challenges in this field. My current focus is on deep diving into modern Android development with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose, advanced software architectures, and performance optimization to build fast and responsive applications. I am always ready to collaborate and learn in new projects!

weatherly.title: Weatherly App
weatherly.desc: A complete weather application with advanced features, including animated backgrounds, glassmorphism style, city search with suggestions, 5-day forecast, and theme settings.

file_scanner.title: Duplicate File Scanner
file_scanner.desc: A Python script that finds duplicate files in a specified path using SHA-256 hashing and saves the results in the console and a JSON file.
